summary: Encapsulates all tensors returned by the Conditional DETR encoder‑decoder, including the final decoder hidden states, optional per‑layer hidden states and attention maps for both encoder and decoder, and an optional stack of layer‑normalized intermediate decoder activations for auxiliary loss computation.
business_intent: Supply a unified, inspectable container of model outputs that supports standard inference as well as advanced training regimes requiring intermediate decoder representations, enabling downstream processing, debugging, and loss calculation.
